item.title: The Gen Z New Yorkers Selling Their Parents on Mamdani
item.description: Young voters went for Zohran Mamdani by a large margin. Can they persuade their parents to do the same?

item.title: War Amputees Find New Purpose on the Golf Course
item.description: The sport helps Ukrainian soldiers who have lost limbs in the war against Russia to heal and to master their prosthetics, rehabilitation experts say.

item.title: Thailand Warns of War With Cambodia as Deadly Clashes Enter 2nd Day
item.description: More than 100,000 people have been displaced in the deadliest conflict between the two nations in 14 years.

item.title: Education Department says it's releasing more than $5 billion in frozen grants
item.description: The grants fund a wide range of education programs, including migrant education, services for English language learners and adult education.
